Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Westbound #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/66th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 67th, Racine, 63rd, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/66th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffrey Local Temporary Reroute at 47th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: #15 Jeffrey Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Wells, Garfield, State, 51st & over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffrey Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 47th/Wentworth.

Northbound buses will operate via 51st, State, Garfield, Wells (then wait recovery time).

Southbound buses will operate via Wells, Garfield, State, 51st, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
